response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This represents an outstanding investment that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1250000}
